alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 18 at 2:41AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, snow with areas of blowing and drifting snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Wind gusts to 40 mph over mountain passes this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains and Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 11 AM MST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow diminishes this morning, but gusty winds will create significant drifting and blowing snow hazards over mountain passes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
